briefdescription.para: Returns the trace of this matrix.
Returns the determinant of this matrix.
Returns diagonal vector of this matrix.
Add input scalar s to specified element.
Subtracts scalar s to specified element.
Multiplies scalar s to the whole matrix.
Returns this matrix * input matrix m.
Makes a sparse matrix with zeros.
Makes a sparse matrix with all diagonal elements to 1, and other elements to 0.
